Peter Shaw (producer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Shaw_(producer) 0 Peter Shaw (born Peter Pullen; 24 June 1918 – 29 January 2003) was an English actor and producer and the second husband of actress Angela Lansbury. Peter_Shaw ( born Peter_Pullen ; 24_June_1918 – 29_January_2003 ) was an_English_actor and producer and the_second_husband of actress_Angela_Lansbury .
